column2: New  Breaking  Request Soil  Survey  Requirements

column1: The  2013 Written  Agreement  Handbook, Subparagraph 22A provides a  list of requirements
for  all new  WA  requests.  Requirement  seven of this  subparagraph states,  “NRCS  soil surveys,
column2: for  all new  WA  requests.  Requirement  seven of this  subparagraph states,  “NRCS  soil surveys,

Soil  Surveys are  a  submission requirement  for  all  New  Breaking  requests  submitted  to  the
Raleigh  RO.  To  start  the  Web  Soil  Survey,  navigate  to  the  following  site:
There  are  multiple   navigational methods  that can be  used to  locate  your Area  of Interest.
